unnormalised: Konknnint konnem mhaka vicharlem ki tum tuji chai khuim dovortat tem visarlear ek neurologistak mellop faideak poddtalem zait? Arey baba, tum tuji buddhi bhonvtan poddtat ani tum tujo chosmo bhonvtan poddtai zalear te appointmment gheupacho vell ailo asa re, bhai. Thoddo-thoddo vell vostu visorpak zata tem sovik, tum thodyak chokkaning chai-cher dokos divpak zata. Punn tum tuje navuch visartai ani tum ten minutam sodhun auto-rickshaw visartai zalear to doctor Gupta AIIMS, Delhi tumkam polleun gheunk zata.

Neurologistan dimagan zata tem polleun dita, tem mahatvache zatam, kithem? Te Alzheimer, Parkinson ani tumche dimagache cells Bollywood asser zallag lagtai tem polleun dita. Te MRI (8000 Rupiya lagta klinikant!) ani EEG korta kiteak tumchea dimagan kitem cholta tem polleunk. Magir tumchi yaadash vishayvanchi tumchi biryani recipe yead dovornat ani tum cricket-anche scores yead dovornat zalear expertsacho updes gheunk favo. Tumcho paados tumcho dista tosli cousin assa mhonn tharta poilim updes gheun gheiat.
normalised: Konnen tori mhaka vicharlem ki ek neurologist-ak bhett divop faydeachem asa vo tumi tumcho chai kitlea pauti dovortat tem visrun voitat zalear. Okay, pashat, tumi tumche chashme tumchea hoxeponnan poros chodd visarlea zalear, tedna to appointment book korpacho vell aikla, bhai. Gambhirponnan sangta, kadich kainch visrop samany asa – taka cutting chai-chea dusrea cup-acher dos divop boreak poddta. Torui astana, tumi tumchem khaxele nanv legit visrun veta vo sadanchi tumi tumchem auto-rickshaw dha mintan mol bhav kortokoch visrun veta zalear, tedna hya, Delhi-chea A-I-I-M-S-antle Doctor Gupta-n ek fautt polleunk zai.

unnormalised: Sarkhem kithem? Thodo-thodo vell visarlear? Besh, thodi jalebi khai. Sarvan vhoddli vostu visarlear ani thoda dimagachem lakshan aslear (tuka lagta tuka Lata Mangeshkar bhaxen gaita mhonn dossa khalya uprant)? Zaituch neurologistak mellat sodanch. Tumchem dimag dhanyavadtolam tum tumchea dimagacho dhanyavad dovortam.
normalised: Neurologist dokeachem kam polletat, jem thorachem kitlench mhotvachem asa, khorem nhoi? Te Alzheimer's, Parkinson's ani tumche dokeache cells chodd Bollywood-ache upbhoga vorvim dharna kortat kai polleunk sakta. Te M-R-I-s sarkheo tests (kainch clinics-ant rupia atth hozar!) ani E-E-G-s vaporun tumchea dokeant kitem cholta tem polleunk sakta. Haka lagun, tumche yaad-ache prosn tumchi favorte biryani-chi recipe yaad dovrunk poddonam vo devachi dukh, tumche cricket scores, tedna kainch expert sallo gheunk zai. Tumcho xezari tumcho lamb-lochon chaitlo mhunn tumi mannunk ravonk naka.

Tollachem kiten? Kadich kainch visar? Chill, thode jalebi khav. Satatyan jivitache mhotvache ghoddnuko visarop vo her neurological lakxananubhav gheunk (joxe, tumi khorench Lata Mangeshkar sarkhe bhagunk zatat mhunn chodd masala dosa khalyauporant chintop)? To neurologist-acho appointment A-S-A-P preponed kora. Tumchem dokem tumchi dhin vaktoli… tumi taka dhin vaktat tem yaad asa mhunn dhorun.
